name: Somninsanium
description:
Somninsanium was created for the YAZJam2 on itch.io in August 2021. My focus and goal in this project was to recreate a certain scene and atmosphere I had in mind, using only 3D assets. It is supposed to be experimental, again, just like Hekate, my first YAZJam project. Based on the chosen theme, the gameplay doesn't take longer than 5 minutes. So don't expect an epic story or complex gameplay.

Language

The game is available in English only. There isn't much text anyway, so you should be able to play it even if you don't exactly understand everything.

Controls
  • Enter to start the game
  • Move your mouse to look around
  • WASD or arrow keys to walk
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to run
  • E or right click to pick up
  • ESC to Quit the game
Credits

Game Design & Development by me (Wiebke Scholz | Hexenwerk)

I recorded all sound effects by myself as well. It was the main requirement & restriction of this game jam to only use sounds based on voice during the jam.
